abstract: Chinese police have detained 22 people from several large companies, including ABB, McDonald’s, McKinsey & Company and Whirlpool.
snippet: Chinese police have detained 22 people from several large companies, including ABB, McDonald’s, McKinsey & Company and Whirlpool.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI, Jan. 19 — The police have detained 22 people in a bribery investigation that has ensnared several large companies, including ABB, McDonald’s, McKinsey & Company and Whirlpool, according to reports on Friday in the state-run news media.

headline.main: Western Companies Caught Up in Chinese Bribery Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Western Companies Caught Up in Chinese Bribery Inquiry
